item.title: Golang Bash Completion with Cobra API
item.description: In this post, I am going to share an example that demonstrates how to use bash completion with a Golang application that uses Cobra, a library to help writing Command Line Interface (CLI) apps. Source repository You can find the sources mentioned in this example at the following Git Repository.
